resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106448</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106448</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206091</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Center for Educational Resources (CERES) Project, The</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte für das pädagogische Projekt der 
Betriebsmittel-(CERES),</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre pour le projet éducatif des ressources 
(CERES),</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro para o projeto educacional dos recursos 
(CERES),</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro per il progetto educativo delle risorse 
(CERES),</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο για το εκπαιδευτικό πρόγραμμα των στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς (CERES),</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro para el proyecto educativo de los recursos 
(CERES),</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is an extensive library of on-line and interactive K-12 science education materials for teaching astronomy. The site contains both classroom science projects and reference materials.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine umfangreiche Bibliothek der Online- und 
interaktiven Wissenschaft K-12 Ausbildung Materialien für 
unterrichtende Astronomie. Die Site enthält 
Klassenzimmerwissenschaft Projekte und Bezugsmaterialien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une bibliothèque étendue des matériaux en 
ligne et interactifs d'éducation de la science K-12 pour l'astronomie
d'enseignement. Le site contient des projets de la science de 
salle de classe et des documentations de référence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma biblioteca extensiva de materiais em linha 
e interativos da instrução da ciência K-12 para a astronomia 
ensinando. O local contem  projetos da ciência da sala de aula 
e materiais de referência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una vasta libreria dei materiali in linea ed 
interattivi di formazione di scienza K-12 per astronomia d'istruzione.
Il luogo contiene sia i progetti di scienza dell'aula che i 
materiali di riferimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια εκτενής βιβλιοθήκη σε απευθείας σύνδεση και
διαλογικών Κ- 12 υλικών εκπαίδευσης επιστήμης για την 
αστρονομία διδασκαλίας. Η περιοχή περιέχει και τα 
προγράμματα επιστήμης τάξεων και τα υλικά αναφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una biblioteca extensa de los materiales en 
línea e interactivos de la educación de la ciencia K-12 para la 
astronomía de enseñanza. El sitio contiene proyectos de la 
ciencia de la sala de clase y los materiales de referencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206091</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106448</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/center-for-educational-resources-ceres-project-the</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
